# Overview {#sec-overview}

## ChatGPT

[ChatGPT](https://openai.com/blog/chatgpt) is an AI chatbot created by OpenAI and released in November 2022. It is based on GPT3.5 and GPT-4. 

## Github Copilot

[Github Copilot](https://github.com/features/copilot) is an AI code assistance tool developed by Github and released in June 2022. It is powered by the OpenAI Codex which is a modified version of GPT-3. Copilot has been trained on public code in Github repositories. The tool provides autocomplete-style suggestions and draws context from comments and code. 

Copilot is available to use via a variety of IDE extensions such as the [VS Code](https://docs.github.com/en/copilot/getting-started-with-github-copilot) extension which is what this book uses. 

Github Copilot X was [recently announced](https://github.com/features/preview/copilot-x) which will include Github Copilot Chat and Docs.
